sentences.en: a stack of books
sentences.cn: 一摞书

sentences.en: a stacking hi-fi system
sentences.cn: 组合式高保真音响设备

sentences.en: cars stack up behind every bus, while passengers queue to pay fares.
sentences.cn: 在乘客排队买车票时，每一辆公共汽车后面的小汽车都排成了长队。

sentences.en: Double-stack trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.cn: 以往由卡车运送的很多货物现在都改用双层列车运送了。

sentences.en: He ordered them to stack up pillows behind his back.
sentences.cn: 他命令他们把几个枕头叠放在自己的背后。

sentences.en: He went back to stacking the shelves.
sentences.cn: 他继续把货物摆上货架。

sentences.en: Her report just doesn't stack up.
sentences.cn: 她的报告不拖沓冗长

sentences.en: How does our product stack up against those of our competitors?
sentences.cn: 我们的产品与我们的竞争者的产品比起来 如何 ?

sentences.en: How does this final presidential debate stack up and compare to the others, do you think?
sentences.cn: 你认为这最后一次总统竞选辩论和其他几次相比怎么样？

sentences.en: How much do all these figures stack up to?
sentences.cn: 这些数字的总和是 多少 ?

sentences.en: I have a stack of emails in my inbox.
sentences.cn: 我的收件箱里有很多电邮。

sentences.en: Mrs. Cathiard was stacking the clean bottles in crates.
sentences.cn: 卡提亚夫人当时正在把干净的瓶子堆放到板条箱里。

sentences.en: our rural schools stack up well against their urban counterparts.
sentences.cn: 我们的乡村学校完全可以比得上城里的同类学校。

sentences.en: Please stack the materials up here.
sentences.cn: 请把材料堆在这里.

sentences.en: stacks of dirty dishes
sentences.cn: 一摞摞脏盘子

sentences.en: The assistants price the items and stack them on the shelves.
sentences.cn: 售货员给商品标价，然后把它们叠放到货架上。

sentences.en: The British will be out to see how they stack up to the competition.
sentences.cn: 英国人将全力以赴，一较高低。

sentences.en: Their gift doesn't stack up against his.
sentences.cn: 他们的礼品比不上他送的

sentences.en: There's a whole stack of bills waiting to be paid.
sentences.cn: 有一大堆账要付呢.

sentences.en: They are specially packaged so that they stack easily.
sentences.cn: 它们经过特别包装以便于堆放.

sentences.en: They said they were going to stack the court with anti-abortion judges.
sentences.cn: 他们说将会往法院中安排一些反对堕胎的法官。

sentences.en: This is how things stack up today.
sentences.cn: 这就是当今的状况.

sentences.en: What did our sales stack up to last month?
sentences.cn: 到上个月为止我们的销售额达到了多少?

sentences.en: When he came in and saw the mess, he blew his stack.
sentences.cn: 当他进来看到一团糟时, 大发雷霆.

words.tran_cn: 妖艳的；（女人）身材丰满匀称的

phrases.tran_cn: 总合烟囱，仅一通道之烟囱
见 pile 条 pile arms
栈溢出；堆叠溢位；堆栈上限溢位
栈指针；栈指示器；堆栈指示字

phrases.phrase: stack up( 或 stack something up)

trans.tran_cn: 垛，干草堆，（一排）烟囱，层积，整个的藏书架排列，书架

trans.tran_en: to make things into a neat pile, or to form a neat pile
to make things into a neat pile, or to form a neat pile

trans.tran_cn: 堆成堆，垛，堆起来或覆盖住，洗牌作弊，秘密事先运作
